Text:
Below is the NFO By UNIQUE:

The beginning is missing, not by much, a couple of borders show now and again, and its overall a dark film but nothing to worry about. So i tried to bring some of the picture back by adjusting gamma, yuv, sat, brightness, contrast, it looks decent to me, but you be the judge of that.

Great picture for a cam, one of the better ones. Sound sucks. Voices are clear but the sound effects like gunshots and music just get lost in the background. Also there's a strange whirring? shound, sounds like the mechanism on an old tapedeck spinning around.

Overall well worth the download, totally watchable, and once someone gets a line for the audio it will make a great TS.

for cam V:7
            A:5  with projector sound

thank-you!

movie. Some might have mentioned it seems a lot like a higher budget less exciting version of The Raid.
